home.title: TankGo
home.subtitle: Smart Fuel Prices Platform
home.description: Real-time updated data, advanced visualization and automatic analysis to help you find the best option for every refuel.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to save on every refuel

realtime.title: Real-Time Prices
realtime.description: Access updated information from all gas stations in Spain. Official government data directly on your screen.

location.title: Location Search
location.description: Find the nearest stations. Filter by province, locality or view on the interactive map.

compare.title: Price Comparison
compare.description: Compare prices for different fuels: Gasoline 95, 98, Diesel, Premium Diesel and more. Sort by price to find the best deal.

favorites.title: Personalized Favorites
favorites.description: Save your favorite gas stations and access them quickly. Set your preferred fuel to see only what interests you.

map.title: Interactive Map
map.description: Visualize all gas stations on a map. Explore by areas, find routes and plan your stops intelligently.

history.title: Price History
history.description: Check historical price evolution. Identify trends and decide the best time to refuel.

howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to start saving

step1.title: Register Free
step1.description: Create your account in seconds. No cost, no commitment.

step2.title: Search and Compare
step2.description: Explore gas stations, filter by location and compare prices instantly.

step3.title: Save Money
step3.description: Choose the best option and save on every refuel. It's that simple!

cta.title: Ready to Start Saving?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who are already optimizing their fuel expenses

gasStations.title: Gas Stations
gasStations.subtitle: Find the best options near you

favorites.title: My Favorites
favorites.subtitle: Your saved gas stations
favorites.noFavoritesDescription: Start saving your favorite gas stations by clicking the heart icon ❤️ on any gas station in the list.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.name: Name
profile.noFavorites: You don't have any favorites saved yet.
profile.exploreAndSave: Explore gas stations and save your favorites
profile.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.

auth.createAccountDescription: Create your account and discover the best prices
